name: activity-roles
description: A discord bot that gives and removes roles from users dependent on their discord presence, but unlike other bots it doesn't remove them if you stop playing.
author: tippfehlr

scripts.tsc-win: npx tsc --outDir out/ && powershell -Command "(gc out/src/modules/bot.js) -replace 'typeScript: true', 'typeScript: false' | Out-File -encoding ASCII out/src/modules/bot.js"
scripts.tsc: npx tsc --outDir out/ && sed -i "s/typeScript: true/typeScript: false/g" out/src/modules/bot.js
